subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cubs are heading into their 99th consecutive year of frustration with a manager who really knows how to vent. Lou Piniella is as famous for his dirt kicking as he is for his pitching changes.
snippet: The Cubs are heading into their 99th consecutive year of frustration with a manager who really knows how to vent. Lou Piniella is as famous for his dirt kicking as he is for his pitching changes.
